div.style: font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; list-style-type: square; text-align: center;
div.p: This view will allow you to audit certain actions performed by users on the Leader. Any updates to configuration changes will show up as events in the resulting panel.
Note: Leader API log collection via edge must be configured in order for this view to populate.

search.query: `set_cribl_internal_log_index` host=$host$ source IN ("*/audit.log", "*/audit1.log", "*/audit2.log", "*/audit3.log", "*/audit4.log") type!="expression" action!="commit" action!="deploy" | stats values("caseNumber") AS caseNumber values("email") AS email values("filename") AS filename values("group") AS group values("guids") AS guids values("id") AS id values("path") AS path values("rows") AS rows values("size") AS size values("type") AS type by _time action user delim=", " | eval id=if(type="system-info", path, id) | eval id=if((action="send" AND type="system-info"), caseNumber, id) | eval id=if((action="upload" AND type="lookups"), ("filename=" + 'filename' + ", rows=" + 'rows' + ", size=" + 'size'), id) | eval id=if((action="register" AND type="licenses"), email, id) | eval id=if(action="restart", guids, id) | table _time user action group type id | fillnull value="-" user action group type id | rename user AS "User", action AS "Action", group AS "WorkerGroup", type AS "Type", id AS "Object", _time AS TIME | mvcombine Object | rex field=Object mode=sed "s/\n/, /g" | rename TIME AS _time | sort 0 - _time
